tool.name: sam2soap
tool.help:
**What it does**
SAM2SOAP converts sequence alignments from `SAM format`_ into `SOAP format`_.
.. _SAM format: http://samtools.sourceforge.net/SAM1.pdf
.. _SOAP format: http://soap.genomics.org.cn/soap1/#Formatofoutput
**Attribution**
SAM2SOAP was written by Peter Briggs and Casey Bergman at University of Manchester, 2012.
